nodes.text: Neri was the star of the Cato Neimoidia system in the Quellor sector, a part of the Colonies and the Slice regions. The star was orbited by the planet Cato Neimoidia as well as its two moons. It sat at grid N-11 on the Standard Galactic Grid and was situated along the Quellor Run hyperspace route.

Neri was mentioned in the thirty-first issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around August 5, 2015. The image used to depict Neri was also used in Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon to illustrate several other stars.
